scripts.build:all: npm run build && cd backend && npm run type-check
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../backend && npm test
scripts.type-check: cd frontend && npm run type-check && cd ../backend && npm run type-check
scripts.db:create: cd backend && wrangler d1 create oekaki-map-db
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && wrangler d1 execute oekaki-map-db --remote --file=./src/db/schema.sql
scripts.db:migrate:local: cd backend && wrangler d1 execute oekaki-map-db --local --file=./src/db/schema.sql
scripts.r2:create: cd backend && wrangler r2 bucket create oekaki-map-tiles
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd backend && npm run deploy
scripts.setup: npm run db:create && npm run r2:create && echo '\n⚠️  wrangler.tomlのdatabase_idを上記の値に更新してください'
